Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.globalworkspace.triggers

Interface Summary
BroadcastTrigger A Trigger determines when a new Broadcast must be triggered.
TriggerListener This interface should be implemented by the class that should receive a trigger notification.
 

Class Summary
AggregateActivationTrigger Implements a trigger that is activated when the sum of all coalitions in GW is greater than the threshold.
IndividualActivationTrigger If any coalition is above threshold, this trigger will fire.
NoBroadcastTrigger This triggers activates if 'delay' milliseconds has passed without a broadcast.
NoNewCoalitionTrigger This trigger fires when x ms has passed w/o a new broadcast.
